articles.description: Vedanta Resources Ltd. has achieved half of its three-year planned reduction commitment of $4 billion in the first year, the London-based company said in an exchange filing. It will continue to deleverage from net debt of $7.7 billion in the next two financia…
articles.content: Billionaire Anil Agarwals commodities giant has slashed net debt by $2 billion in the current financial year as it seeks to soothe investor concern over its liquidity and ability to repay upcoming ob… [+1021 chars]

articles.title: Tata Power shares gain 0.76% as Sensex falls - Economic Times
articles.description: A total of 104,528 shares changed hands on the counter till 10:31AM (IST)
articles.content: Shares of Tata Power Company Ltd. traded 0.76 per cent up at Rs 204.65 at 10:31AM (IST) on Wednesday, even as BSE benchmark Sensex dropped 67.99 points to 60964.27. The scrip had closed at Rs 203.1 i… [+1058 chars]
